summary: Domain Status, Monitoring & Lifecycle Refactor system fully tested. All three distinct status types working correctly: domain_active_status (AUTO), monitoring_status (AUTO), lifecycle_status (MANUAL). Backend APIs return correct data, filters work, view mode tabs filter correctly, Super Admin lifecycle actions available.
passed_tests: GET /api/v3/asset-domains returns 200 with paginated data
Domain response includes domain_active_status field (AUTO computed from expiration_date)
Domain response includes domain_active_status_label (Active/Expired)
Domain response includes monitoring_status field (AUTO technical)
Domain response includes monitoring_status_label (Up/Down/Unknown/etc)
Domain response includes lifecycle_status field (MANUAL strategic)
Domain response includes lifecycle_status_label (Active/Released/Quarantined)
Domain response includes quarantine_category field
Domain response includes seo_networks array with NO duplicates
Domain response includes monitoring_enabled, monitoring_allowed, requires_monitoring fields
Filter by domain_active_status=active works
Filter by domain_active_status=expired works
Filter by monitoring_status=up/down/unknown works
Filter by lifecycle_status=active/released/quarantined works
Filter by quarantine_category works
Filter by is_quarantined=true/false works
view_mode=all works
view_mode=released returns only released domains
view_mode=quarantined returns only quarantined domains
view_mode=unmonitored returns domains in SEO without monitoring
GET /api/v3/quarantine-categories returns all expected categories (spam, dmca, manual_penalty, penalized, other)
GET /api/v3/monitoring/coverage returns stats with all required fields
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/set-lifecycle endpoint exists and works
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/quarantine endpoint exists
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/remove-quarantine endpoint exists
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/mark-released endpoint exists
Frontend: SEO Monitoring Coverage panel displays all stats correctly
Frontend: View mode tabs (All, Unmonitored in SEO, Released, Quarantined) present and functional
Frontend: Table columns correct - Domain, Brand, Category, Domain Active Status, Monitoring Status, Lifecycle, Quarantine, SEO Networks, Monitoring Toggle, Expiration, Actions
Frontend: Domain Active Status column shows Active/Expired badges
Frontend: Monitoring Status column shows Unknown/Up/Down badges
Frontend: Lifecycle column shows Active/Released/Quarantined badges with info tooltip
Frontend: Quarantine category column shows category labels (spam_murni, Penalized, etc.)
Frontend: SEO Networks column shows network badges without duplicates
Frontend: Monitoring Toggle column shows ON/OFF/N/A based on lifecycle rules
Frontend: Expiration column shows date and days remaining
Frontend: Filters - Domain Active Status (Active/Expired) works
Frontend: Filters - Monitoring Status (Up/Down/Soft Blocked/JS Challenge/Country Block/Captcha/Unknown) works
Frontend: Filters - Lifecycle (Active/Released/Quarantined) works
Frontend: Filters - Quarantine (Not Quarantined/Quarantined/categories) works
Frontend: Super Admin sees lifecycle dropdown with Change Lifecycle, Quarantine/Unquarantine, Delete actions
Frontend: Quarantined tab filters correctly (2 domains: domaintest.com, orphan-domain.com)
Frontend: Released tab filters correctly (3 domains)
Frontend: Quarantined domains show N/A for Monitoring Toggle (correct - monitoring not allowed)

features_verified.domain_active_status: AUTO computed from expiration_date - Active if not expired, Expired if past expiration date
features_verified.monitoring_status: AUTO technical availability - Up/Down/Unknown/Soft Blocked/JS Challenge/Country Block/Captcha
features_verified.lifecycle_status: MANUAL strategic decision - Active/Released/Quarantined. Super Admin only can edit.
features_verified.quarantine_category: Shows why domain is quarantined (spam, dmca, manual_penalty, penalized, other)
features_verified.seo_networks: Shows network badges with no duplicates, links to network detail
features_verified.monitoring_toggle: ON/OFF/N/A based on rules - N/A if lifecycle != Active or domain expired
features_verified.monitoring_coverage_panel: Shows domains in SEO, monitored, unmonitored, coverage %, released, quarantined counts
features_verified.view_mode_tabs: All, Unmonitored in SEO, Released, Quarantined - each filters server-side correctly
features_verified.filters: Domain Active Status, Monitoring Status, Lifecycle, Quarantine Category all work
features_verified.super_admin_actions: Change Lifecycle, Quarantine/Unquarantine, Release Domain, Delete Domain

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: Three distinct status types properly implemented in backend and frontend
GOOD: domain_active_status correctly computed from expiration_date (not stored in DB)
GOOD: monitoring_status shows technical availability from monitoring engine
GOOD: lifecycle_status restricted to Super Admin for MANUAL changes
GOOD: quarantine_category shows reason for quarantine with proper labels
GOOD: seo_networks array has no duplicates (using Set for deduplication)
GOOD: monitoring_allowed correctly False when lifecycle != active or domain expired
GOOD: View mode tabs use server-side filtering with view_mode parameter
GOOD: Lifecycle tooltip provides clear explanation of status meanings
GOOD: SEO Monitoring Coverage panel shows comprehensive stats
context_for_next_testing_agent: Domain Status, Monitoring & Lifecycle system fully tested and working. Three status types: 1) domain_active_status (AUTO - Active/Expired from expiration_date), 2) monitoring_status (AUTO - Up/Down/Unknown from monitoring), 3) lifecycle_status (MANUAL - Active/Released/Quarantined, Super Admin only). Backend APIs: GET /api/v3/asset-domains supports filters domain_active_status, monitoring_status, lifecycle_status, quarantine_category, is_quarantined, view_mode. Super Admin endpoints: POST .../set-lifecycle, .../quarantine, .../remove-quarantine, .../mark-released. Frontend shows all columns correctly with proper badges and tooltips. Test credentials: superadmin@seonoc.com / SuperAdmin123!
